install_msg: Thank you for installing raffle. Be sure to check out the wiki here: https://github.com/Redjumpman/Jumper-Plugins/wiki/Raffle-RedV3
name: Raffle
description: Create reaction based raffles with timers that persist through restarts and shutdowns.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
